author: Bradford Betz
title: Guest on Chinese-produced Arabic-language program claimed US may be to blame for coronavirus pandemic
description: A Chinese-produced program broadcast to the Arab world last month, blamed the COVID-19 pandemic on the United States, according to a transcript released Friday from a media research group.
content:

A newly uncovered claim, from a Chinese-produced program broadcast to the Arab world last month, suggested the U.S. may be responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic, acc… [+2499 chars]
